name: Mr. Runner 2: Final Rush
description:
Miss the little stick running man Mr. Runner? The next entry in the Mr. Runner series is here! Start this wonderful adventure today!

EASY, FUN AND RELAXING GAME PLAY!

FEATURES:
*Simple two touch controls: touch left to slow down or right to speed up
*Cute characters, marvelous animations, HD optimized graphics, and stunning art direction
*Game Center supported to challenge your friends

Check out the game trailer:
